gmc_hdfs.replicationsimulator

Class Datacenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • gmc_hdfs.replicationsimulator.Datacenter

  • public class Datacenter
extends java.lang.Object
    The data center is a resource for distributed storing systems such as cloud storages which integrates several storing nodes. These nodes are connected in the data center. The data is stored in the nodes.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Datacenter.Router
      The routers do the routing in the data centers.
